text: Yousuf Karsh (December 23, 1908 â€“ July 13, 2002) was a Canadian photographer. He had Armenian heritage. He was a portrait painter. His work includes portraits of statesmen, artists, authors, musicians, film directors, scientists, and other people that do important things. He was celebrated by a festival in 2009. == References == willy == Other websites == * Category:1908 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Canadian painters Category:Canadian photographers
